Garanti BBVA Kripto partners with Bitstamp on providing crypto trading services for its clients
Garanti BBVA Kripto partners with Bitstamp to provide secure crypto trading, boosting adoption and accessibility in Turkey's digital asset market.
LTP and Bitstamp Partner on Liquidity and Credit Solutions for Institutional-Grade Crypto Trading
LTP, a leading digital asset prime broker, is excited to announce a strategic partnership with Bitstamp, the world's longest-running, and one of the most trusted, cryptocurrency exchanges.
Bitstamp raises standards in the crypto market with EU regulator approval of MiFID MTF license
Bitstamp is among the first cryptocurrency exchanges to receive a MiFID MTF and is now authorized to offer sophisticated products like crypto derivatives products, including perpetual swaps.
Bitstamp’s security proven again with a perfect 100-100 score by Kaiko
Bitstamp achieves a perfect 100/100 security score in Kaiko’s Q3 2024 Exchange Rating, ranking as a top 2 exchange. See why Bitstamp is a trusted crypto platform.
Bitstamp announces a partnership with Stripe to support Stripe's fiat-to-crypto onramp in EU

Bitstamp, the world's longest-running crypto exchange, has announced it is partnering with Stripe, a financial infrastructure platform for businesses, to support Stripe's fiat-to-crypto onramp across the EU.
Bitstamp to restore crypto assets to Mt. Gox creditors
Bitstamp, the world’s longest-running crypto exchange, is today starting the process to return recovered digital assets to Mt. Gox creditors.
Bitstamp partners with Banque Delubac & Cie to offer crypto exchange services
Bitstamp partners with Banque Delubac & Cie to offer secure cryptocurrency exchange services, combining over a century of financial expertise with top-tier crypto compliance.
Bitstamp confirms changes to accord with MiCA regulation
Bitstamp, the world’s longest-running crypto exchange, has confirmed enhancements to its offering in advance of Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA)

Robinhood to Acquire Bitstamp 

This acquisition will bring Bitstamp's globally-scaled crypto exchange to Robinhood, with retail and institutional customers across the EU, UK, US and Asia.
Bitstamp to integrate with Copper ClearLoop network to provide enhanced asset security to institutional clients
